website_summaries.verdict: With a wide variety of patterns and colors, these drawstring bags make suitcase or closet organization a breeze.
pros: Colors are great for closet or suitcase organization
Can also be used as a travel laundry bag
Nylon material repels water and has drawstring closures

customer_reviews.title: FashionBoutique high quality waterproof Nylon shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: these are good sturdy bags. i'm using to organize open shelfs and the different colors help locate what i need later.their decently priced. and i put my size 11 mens sas shoes in them no problem. hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: mickey l bailey

customer_reviews.title: Saves your clothes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to take on a trip to Spain this month. She didn't seem thrilled with it. But she was taking two pairs of shoes and wearing a pair, so I thought it might help keep things clean and neat in her suitcase. She ended up using them and had not one complaint. If you travel, you need something to keep shoes from ending up on your clean clothes. I have used shower caps in the past, they were from the dollar store and cheap. And the shoes were knocked around and ended up on my clothes. So this is why I pushed her using these.
customer_reviews.author: bg1

customer_reviews.title: Travelers Rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have used grocery bags to separate my shoes from the rest of my clothing when I pack my suitcase. I always disliked that solution but it was both cost effective and easy. These shoe bags protect my clothes and help keep my shoes together. They're a great aid and not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful, except that drawstring came out
customer_reviews.text: Nice, washes well, one caveat: the drawstrings come out too easily. I think maybe they're a little short, or maybe just too slippery. Not sure, but at any rate, I think I had to reinstall one twice last time I took this on a trip. Luckily, we had a little safety pin handy. If you know that trick, it's not too hard, except at the end you have to watch out for the seam allowance -- it can stick out and block the channel. If you hit it, you have to back up the safety pin and figure out how to push the seam allowance out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Philosopher

customer_reviews.title: Repel dirt, dust, and moisture
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these shoe bags, I was packing my footwear in used grocery bags like some backwoods vagabond. That's one step away from living like a transient and eating off the floor. I had to put a stop to it, so I classed up my travel game with these shoe bags. They repel dirt, dust, and moisture. The drawstring is a nice addition, although I rarely use it. And even though they're durable, they're also light and can easily be folded when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Danny

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They work well. I bought some Cord Stops (for drawstring bags) and attached them to the bags so I can have the bag stay shut. I applied fabric glue to the ends of the cord so they don't unravel. NOW I am happy with them. So, they aren't perfect, but I modified them to get them how I want them to be. They are large, roomy and waterproof. If I spill something in my bag my shoes are protected. I can stack my Teva sandals and use a bag for several pairs of sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Review of FashionBoutique high quality waterproof Nylon shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: These FashionBoutique high quality waterproof Nylon shoe bags are intended to further protect my Nikon lenses when I put them inside their OEM nylon lens cases. Because they are made of nylon, they do not attract dust which will keep my Nikon lenses clean and also repel water to prevent moisture from entering the lenses that can cause damage. These nylon shoe bags also add further lens protection from nicks and dings inside my camera backpack during travel.
customer_reviews.author: E6Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great way to protect shoes and clothing ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these on three cruises so far -- they're a great way to keep your shoes from shifting around the suitcase and protect your clothes from shoes that shift around the suitcase. I wear women's size 11 shoes, and these are definitely large enough to fit all the shoe styles I usually take along on a cruise. Really happy with these. Not sure about the long-term durability, but so far, they're holding up OK. Solid 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: L. MountfordTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: waterproof Nylon bags
customer_reviews.text: I have used these every time I travel and they still look like new. I use them for more than shoes. When I am taking my duffel bag, it is a great way to keep all my personal effects separated from the rest of my clothing. And sometimes I use it to separate my clothing. I would recommend these nylon bags.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: A must for travel:  Protects other clothing, keeps dirt/smells inside the shoe bag!  Versatile uses too....
customer_reviews.text: Just used these, nice colors and quality seems ok, like the double drawstrings (closes well). Size good for sneakers and men's shoes (husband is size 11 foot). I get the 2 colorful ones, hubby got the 2 dark colors....easy to see in luggage. Fabric should hold any smells from feet as well as any dirt left on shoes....reasonable priced too! Haven't washed yet, but should be washable....also could use for wet clothing, etc. if needed. Versatile uses for these bags when traveling.....
customer_reviews.author: FL Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caught by surprise.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large (17") bags to store boots in during the off season. The bag was label "laundry bag". And that is exactly what it was. The size of the bags worked with the boots, because they are one big square, but I'm not sure how much protection they will provide. Bottom line the bag is not really designed or the right measurements for shoes and boots, but it will make a handy travel laundry bag, which is how I will use them.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: These are some good basic shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: These are some good basic shoe bags. For some reason, I expected the material to be a little more fabric like, but that was my error. So be prepared that the material is very stiff and almost plastic - like. But they got the job done. They're were plenty big for my shoes and didn't take up too much space in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Anestazia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for protecting my husband’s shoes inside his bag when he packs for the gym and work day. I use them for dance shoes and fancy shoes when I have to pack multiple pairs for auditions. I love that they are water resistant, don’t absorb sweaty smell, and the drawstring is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Little SJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice slumber bag holder!
customer_reviews.text: These were too big to hold my daughter's dance shoes (the purpose for which I purchased them); however, they serve great to hold our child-size slumber bags! (Not the thick bulky kind for cold-weather camping, but the thinner "sleeping over at a friend's house" kind.) So, we found a good use for them. I can also see them useful to pack in luggage to hold dirty laundry or for other kinds of things that you want to group together in a closet to keep organized.
customer_reviews.author: artemishunter

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: I recently converted to a packing cube traveler and bought these for my shoes. No complaints. They're nylon shoe bags. I like that they close with drawstrings to keep the shoes inside. Now I don't have to scramble for those plastic grocery bags to cover my shoes in my luggage...The grocery bags that fall off or fall apart after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, drawstrings suck
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a year now and used them very frequently. I always got compliments on my shoe bags and they are large enough to fit multiple pairs of flats, or even a pair of high heels and one pair of additional flats. Unfortunately the strings are not the best quality and they all came undone over time and slipped out, which is very disappointing and hard to get back in. I still use the bags and they have held up, but I wish the drawstrings weren't as slippery.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Great colors. Have to put size 8
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. Great colors. Have to put size 8.5 running shoes in backwards for the bag to close. And the string is difficult to keep closed unless you put a know in it. A string lock clip would be a quick fix. Otherwise. They work great! They could also be used as a toiletries bag for a quick need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not That Waterproof...
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and look of these bags (they are so multipurpose!), but I was really disappointed with the "waterproof" fabric. The outside isn't waterproof at all and the inside can't withstand very much standing water (which is sad, because putting shoes inside will result in standing water!). I actually had a waterproofing spray that I used on the outside and that really helped. Don't purchase if you want something watertight.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Grove

customer_reviews.title: A good travel buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe bags for traveling and keeping your shoes separate from your clothes. They're well made and durable, the ties at the top are somewhat useless depending on how bulky your shoes are. I wear an 11.5 and that seems to be on the upper limit of what the bag can hold.
customer_reviews.author: WiscoSkip

customer_reviews.title: Great and keep your suitcase clean
customer_reviews.text: These are great - I need one for each of a pair of tall boots but otherwise they easily hold a pair of women's shoes. Like the colors, neither specifically male nor female. Keep my suitcase clean and can easily find a certain pair of shoes. Needed all 4 for my last trip to NYC :) Not sure if they can hold a pair of men's shoes as my husband has never used them but they look big enough.
customer_reviews.author: chicago

customer_reviews.title: Great for different uses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a year ago, and while a couple of them have been passed on/decluttered, I like how these bags are big enough to hold shoes or even handbags, depending on the size of it. You could even put socks or other undergarments into them if you wanted to, so I'd say these bags are great for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Size is convenient for holding a pair of sneakers (size 8). May not be suitable for larger sneakers or shoes. Works well retaining shoe odor from dispersing in luggage. The draw string works well keeping the shoe / sneakers secured.
customer_reviews.author: Cdub

customer_reviews.title: Big and Roomy Shoe Bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! I commute to downtown Chicago and was throwing my shoes in my bag; gross! I started searching for shoe bags and found this set. I loved that it came with 4 so I know they will last me awhile! The bags are very roomy. In fact, I used one of them to transport my gym clothes to and from work however that proved to be a bit too much weight as the bag started to fray. At any rate, using them for shoes has been great and I can even fit boots in them which is nice for winter. The material is easy to clean which makes them even better. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: fatcatprincess

customer_reviews.title: they comfortably fit any normal shoes you're looking to protect or ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for shoe bags, this will definitely do the trick. While they aren't particularly cute or made of any special material, they comfortably fit any normal shoes you're looking to protect or wrap. I will say that boots would probably not fit in the bag - you could probably do one boot per bag in a pinch but these are made for sneakers/flats/loafers/etc. Overall a good solid purchase, looks like they are pretty good quality and should last for a few years. Material looks easy to wash and dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: CarmenK

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic shopping bags for this world traveler!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally arrived! No more plastic shopping bags for this world traveler (aka EPCOT)! These beauties don't exactly turn heads in the resort lobby being packed inside my luggage, but it's fun knowing something they don't know. I have a secret and I'm not telling you! My shoes are inside sacks of nylon! In your face standard room, parking lot view, still using old shopping bags for shoes people!
customer_reviews.author: ThatMouse

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes and other things
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for shoes, work boots or a thousand other things you would want to organize in your luggage, in your RV or on your boat.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bags!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the high quality of these bags. They are generously sized. I can easily fit two pairs of women's shoes in each one. The material seems like it will last through many trips and I adore the hot pink with polka dot print. Perfect product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping your shoes separate from the rest of your clothes when traveling or when storing under a bed/in a closet to prevent them from getting dusty. Definitely a nice step up from grocery store plastic bags/shower caps and much more durable. When they start to get dirty, I just throw them into the washing machine with my towels or bath rugs and they're as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Appauled at how cheaply made they are
customer_reviews.text: My heading says it all. It is near impossible to find quality shoe bags these days. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Swiggett

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors, great product
customer_reviews.text: I travel fairly frequently for work or on the weekends visiting family or friends in surrounding cities. I always need more than one pair of shoes, but I've never liked having them all tossed together with my clothes. In the past I've just used grocery bags to keep them separate. These are so much nicer! Different colors make it easy to grab the pair i want, the drawstring is easy to tighten and loosen. Well worth the few bucks!
customer_reviews.author: ladyhannah

customer_reviews.title: Please define high quality
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for cheap shoe bags, then this is good. I wouldn’t characterized the bags as high quality as the title denotes that is why the product only receives a three star- it’s ok but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Vob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - selection of colors
customer_reviews.text: Top notch quality; durable, somewhat heavy nylon and very well-constructed/sewn. I'm using when traveling and for keeping my "better" heels protected in the closet. I attached those little "Avery White Strung Marking Tags" to the drawstring, so I know what's inside each bag. You may pay a bit more for these bags versus some of the others on Amazon, but the quality is perfect,IMHO. (p.s. When I ordered, Blue was available... now it's not... Also, note when you're looking at the colors available, the price varies a little bit)
customer_reviews.author: Hooked on Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: More than a shoe bag
customer_reviews.text: purchased these based on other reviews that they were used as "wet bags" in luggage. One is large enough to hold socks/underwear from a family of 3 weekend trips. Also, used for wet kid swim suits after splash pad play at the zoo & park. Gave one to my sister who spent a week in Scotland - she was thankful to have it even though skeptical when she took it. Different colors are a nice plus. Considering purchasing again for stocking stuffers for college aged nephews/nieces.
customer_reviews.author: adventurekid'smom

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Water leaks through the stitches, and possibly through the fabric. Too thin to be water resistant. May be ok against some spray.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Organization, functionality & cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: The bags are sized for men's as well as women's shoes. Easy on & off, drawstring for added protection & cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: gail cooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Winter or whenever you need to carry shoes with you.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these for Christmas Presents to my daughter's. These are easy to fold up when not using and great to carry your shoes in when you are wearing boots to work. I have been looking for something for quite awhile for my shoes when I wear winter boots and these are a wonderful items especially for the price. Order came very fast and used them for stocking stuffers My daughter is using them while she flies to put her shoes in her suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Ro13135

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal so it isn't really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: You can't call these 'waterproof' when the top doesn't seal. It's just a little drawstring at the top, not a true seal. Truth in advertising is vital. It's like saying your phone is waterproof unless you get water in the audio jack... it's a ridiculous way to advertise. These hold shoes. Waterproof doesn't come into it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schneiderman

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect! They fit men's size 10 shoes (work shoes, sandals, or sneakers) perfectly. The colors are very nice (warm colors that are not too overly bright). I bought these for my husband because he travels a lot and carries a lot of shoes in nike bags. These bags freed up a lot of space in his bags. I will buy more for me as these are also perfect for heels and sandals for women.
customer_reviews.author: HonestConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe bags - I like them.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and he was thrilled. Simple bags, but fabric feels nice and doesn't seem like it'll rip easily. The large size will fit my hubby's 10.5 shoes nicely. So much better than using grocery bags, and then wondering after the fact if you used the bags for shoes or not! and these are washable too!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clothes clean!
customer_reviews.text: My family just traveled to Italy, and everyone had their own color of these nifty little bags, so it was easy to tell who's bags were who's. When we packed to leave one hotel to go to the next city on our stop, we just slid our dirty shoes and soiled clothes into these bags and tossed them into our suitcases with everything else, with no worries about the filth of Rome or Florence getting on our clean garments. They took some of the stress out of our traveling, (at least for a mom) and every little bit of help is very much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: The Right Bag
customer_reviews.text: The material of this shoe bag feels durable and is the right size for my size 7 heels. I’m sure I will get the most out of the set I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for nice sized bags. I was able to fit my ankle booties with a 2 inch heel in these. Haven't encountered a situation where I found out if it actually was waterproof or not but from what I've seen it seems to be sturdy enough and dirt definitely doesn't get through.
customer_reviews.author: yuki gackt

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for the frequent traveler
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put my shoes in and dirty laundry. They are super useful!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set of these to take on a camping trip. I wanted them mainly for our hiking boots so we didn't have dirty shoes all over the car. They functioned as intended. The only downside is, the string to tie the bag broke on a couple of the bags, but that is an easy enough replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shauri

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage & travel
customer_reviews.text: I love them, put my swimsuit in one; shoes in another.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were nylon but it's a cheap faeic... returned them
customer_reviews.author: Tossapon

customer_reviews.title: Shoe bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for having to grab a pair of shoes on the go. Just slip them into the bag and off you go, no hassle of trying to keep them in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not only for shoes
customer_reviews.text: One bag for my spinning class shoes, one for flip flops when traveling, one for regular shoes, one for jacket, one for rain coat, etc. etc. Different colors is a good idea too. Have not tested them for waterproof but believe the maker's claim.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan

customer_reviews.title: Traveling bags
customer_reviews.text: Gift for one of my girls ... she travels a lot and keeps her shoes in these
customer_reviews.author: Peggy  W Thomason

customer_reviews.title: TAKE EXTRA SHOES WHEN YOU TRAVEL!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! We like to take a few pairs of extra shoes when we travel and these are fantastic for storing separately from your clothing! Product is highly recommended and Seller gets a Triple AAA+ from us! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Head

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. They are a good size. They fit a pair of males size 11 shoes/ woman's size 9 heels. The different colors are helpful to keep track of your different shoes when traveling. Definitely going to buy another set so my boyfriend and don't have to share!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for Christmas because when we fly anywhere, he wears deck shoes (slip-ons) for the flight and packs the tennies in the suitcase. The tennies now go in these bags, which will reduce the chance of smudging his clothes in the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: These are of a good material. They are larger than I thought which is a plus so they can fit any shape of shoe. so yet again I'm pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shamillia

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I like the pattern and color, but the fabric is too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to avoid using a plastic shopping bag, however my shoes that were inside still got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa0624

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: The 15.1" size fits my pair of shoes perfectly. As an example, I can fit one pair of high top converse (women size 8, men size 6) in it with some room to spare. Seems like good quality. Now I don't need to worry about my clothes getting dirty or having to use plastic bags that are pretty hard to get a hold of these days.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Not Color Accurate
customer_reviews.text: The nylon bags are nice and come with a drawstring. But the color is more of a dark blue as opposed to navy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas gift for my grandpa. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: yazmyn Hilton Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good size, nice appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Big, useful bags. They fit up to 2 pairs of running shoes or up to 3 pairs of sandals and heels (I'm a woman's size 9, so they're not teeny shoes). They seem to keep their clean appearance and not gather dirt, either. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: NCBean

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Bags Organizers!
customer_reviews.text: Great Nylon Bags To Storage Your Shoes When You Travelling! (Pack Of 4) With Nice Colors And Durable Quality! I Suggest This Pack 100%
customer_reviews.author: Guillen Urias

customer_reviews.title: Great for gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, each bag can fit a pair of shoes. I'm size 8.5 in mens and i have been able to fit sneakers and dress shoes
customer_reviews.author: Shahid Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 packs of these for travel and have already used them. I chose the color assortment pack as it makes it easier to distinguish between the shows compared to all being black. Quality is good and the material seem like it will be easy to wipe clean if it gets dirty. The only thing that I wish they had were those spring loaded button on the string to hold them closed.
customer_reviews.author: KurtD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great idea for carrying shoes while traveling
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great idea for carrying shoes while traveling. I wish that these had something to keep them closed after you pull the draw string. They do wiggle loose. That's the only reason I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tillie67

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but I should have bought smaller ones --- these were huge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bag feels a bit cheap, but 4 doe
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm just amazed at how much room this bag could hold. Fits my 11 inch shoes and more! I do agree that this bag feels a bit cheap. But it does come in a 4 pack, so if your first one rips, then use the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Vue Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! The bags are larger than needed for my size 9 women's shoes or sneakers. Sturdily made but I haven't washed them yet. I probably not need to purchase ever again. I got the bright pink and it is a true fuschia, not flourescent pink.
customer_reviews.author: icnony

customer_reviews.title: Packing made clean!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for packing! I have a lot of shoes and when I travel I travel with a lot of shoes! This made it so easy to keep them separate from my clothes so nothing got dirty! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my golf shoes and bowling shoes in the trunk of my car. These are great for that purpose. I should of bought it sooner. Set of 4 is great as I needed the extra two for travel.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fills the bill.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple item, but just what i needed. Just as described and seem to be very good quality. I have used them extensively while traveling and no problems at all. I'll be happy to buy them again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Used them on our most recent trip and worked great. Only wish the bags had a clamp on ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them on our most recent trip and worked great. Only wish the bags had a clamp on the string to keep them tightly closed for stinky shoes.
customer_reviews.author: kassie bradberry

customer_reviews.title: Nice for separating shoes with clothes when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Nice for separating shoes with clothes when traveling; I would have given them 5 stars if the bags were just a tad longer - enough so that the drawstring end would close completely with high-top size shoes inside.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bags are a little thinner than expected but great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: just bags, too large
customer_reviews.text: These are standard nylon bags, but too large for a pair of shoes (I wear men's size 11). They can be used for other purposes so I am keeping them, and the quality seems okay, but they are not made for shoes and I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: rich1896

customer_reviews.title: What I initially thought was a good idea ended up changing as my dirty shoes made ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip. What I initially thought was a good idea ended up changing as my dirty shoes made the shoe bags messy and I eventually threw out. Oh well, live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: fits regular sized shoes
customer_reviews.text: fits regular sized shoes. I am a 10.5 wide and they just fit. if you have bigger feet, would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shawn E.

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe(s) Fits
customer_reviews.text: I used a shoe bag recently on a flight where it proved itself by not allowing the shampoo that made its way out of the bottle and bag I wrapped it in onto some of the other things in my luggage. For what it's worth, my shoes were dry and completely untouched, as the bag did not allow any moisture to seep through.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The string is poorly tied. One came out of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Drawstrings tend to fall out
customer_reviews.text: The bag is decent quality (its nylon) -- but the drawstrings are terrible. They tend to fall out when washed. Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: Cord issues
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for bringing shoes to work, gym bag, or in a suitcase. The only issue is that the cords always get lost inside the 'tunnel' when they are being laundered in the machine, even when it is knotted up before the cycle; this makes it very difficult to retrieve.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Dancers shoe bags
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for my praise dance group's shoes. There was also enough room for them to add more of their belongings.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: These are great! They're big enough to fit a variety of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They're big enough to fit a variety of different shoe types (wedges, sneakers, heels, etc.) and keep the rest of my luggage clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This shoe bag serves its purpose. I’m a flight attendant and use it daily and it is fine quality. Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: kellyzimmer0109

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage made out of cheap quality nylon / Teflon fabric which may scratch your good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality and colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and colors. Very spacious so fit my flats and heels. FYI: Only fits 1 hiking shoe per bag (size 9 US)
customer_reviews.author: Neetu Verma

customer_reviews.title: Good choice to protect your clothing from dirty shoes while traveling
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shoe bags and very durable. Love the different colors they come in. I ordered 2 sets so I would be sure to have enough of them. The only thing is that they are a little big for smaller shoes but otherwise they are really great. Recommend them to everyone that travels and needs shoe bags.
customer_reviews.author: PJBxxxx

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I'm able to fit one pair of running ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I'm able to fit one pair of running shoes (size 8) no problem, or 2 pairs of sandals. My only issue with them is the cinch string comes loose easily, would be nice if they had some mechanism for keeping them closed.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulky shoes
customer_reviews.text: These bags are well made and fit my size 10 running shoes perfectly. I was concerned they would not hold bulkier shoes well and that is not the case. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FGM

customer_reviews.title: I love using shoe bags to keep everything else in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love using shoe bags to keep everything else in my suitcase clean. The different colors of these bags makes it easier to know which shoes are in which bag without having to open the bag. Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: jawhite

customer_reviews.title: Better for men's shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoe bags are much larger than I need (women's size 9) and would be better for bulky men's shoes. I will still use them, just will have to fold them over. The drawstring doesn't hold the bag closed. For the price, the fabric is a good quality, but because of less than ideal function I give them 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: shoe bag
customer_reviews.text: good bags works as I needed it, only negative is the bag wont stay closed, there is not a stopper to prevent it from opening.
customer_reviews.author: Charise Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great to put your boots or shoes in after using ...
customer_reviews.text: Great to put your boots or shoes in after using them on a vacation. Can be used for many other things. Nice size. substantial. The slide gripper on the cord stays put nicely.
customer_reviews.author: prissone

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had known about these bags 10 years ago. I have put the shopping bags to rest and now its only my little blue bag if I need to take an extra pair of shoes wherever I go !!! YEAH!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice and handy bags. It holds a pair of shoe not only for women also for men.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Size 13- perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what they say they will do. A pair of my size 13 dress shoes fit in them perfectly, and make packing for work travel a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ash

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect for what I needed them for - not for ...
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for what I needed them for - not for shoes, but for storing 12' strands of Christmas lights. I'm sure they'll work fine for shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: D2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for packing shoes or other dirty items in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Zack

customer_reviews.title: I use these as shoe covers for traveling and also ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these as shoe covers for traveling and also as dust covers for handbags. Decent quality. No transfer of color.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Loved the different colors - made the need for unpacking less dire. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LHinVA

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel bags
customer_reviews.text: Great little travel bags for shoes, various toiletries, food snack, etc. Reordering.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hot Pink Color !!
customer_reviews.text: Very generous sized bags for the price, a bit stiff, but each one will hold shoes or laundry while traveling, even items for the dog or cat. I love the color !! A nice hot pink with a drawstring.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Soul

product_meta.title: FashionBoutique 10 Pack Waterproof Nylon Shoe Bags Travel Friends (Black)
product_meta.description:
Size:15.1"(L)x12.2"(W)| Color:10 Pack (Black)

Good shoe bags for journey! You won't want to travel without these useful bags.

These bags are made from 210-denier, water-repellent nylon with a drawstring closure.They are durable and reusable as you can expect.

Not only for travel but also home use,keeping items separated and organized.For example, protect clothes from dirty shoes in the suitcase or keeping items from getting dusty in the closet.


FashionBoutique brand always try best to provide fashion and necessary products for your daily life! High Quality is our guarantee!
feature_bullets: FashionBoutique brand: Set of 10 shoe bags with single drawstring closure
Provides durable,lasting storage with high quality Water Repellent Material: Nylon.
Perfect for Travel use, you can store clean or dirty shoes with these bags.
Also great for keeping your favorite shoes from getting dusty in the closet!
